title: I just played lucian adc for the first time since runes reforged and he's hot garbage
body: Feel like he needs love somehow

replies.body:
nah dude this is boards

adcs have to be garbage and we r only a step closer to doing this to all adcs :^)
The overlords have decreed that he is a midlaner.  Perhaps it's you who are confused?

> [{quoted}](name=LegitBusinessman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NlrmhEHV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-08T04:37:05.418+0000)
>
> The overlords have decreed that he is a midlaner.  Perhaps it's you who are confused?

why are all the adcs just going everywhere but bot lane?

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NlrmhEHV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-08T04:40:38.708+0000)
>
> why are all the adcs just going everywhere but bot lane?

Because Riot doesn't know what to do with Quinn, for example. Corki deals 80% of his Autos in magic damage so his makes sense. Lucian mid is... a mobility/bully thing I guess?

Lucian mid is horrible. He literally has a 41% WR

http://na.op.gg/champion/lucian/statistics/mid

He needs at least a mini rework honestly,he's so useless against tanks,even with botrk,its much safer to take Tristana or Ez and just stay out of their range while you shoot them,second shot could deal % max Hp damage,or his ult could be reworked to something that can actually do more than 300 damage to a tank,its a shittier MF ult,where you can move but your whole ult can be blocked by a tank or just dodged,at least MF can get lucky and ult 3-4 people and kill at least 2

> [{quoted}](name=HarrowR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NlrmhEHV,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-12-08T18:56:43.465+0000)
>
> He needs at least a mini rework honestly,he's so useless against tanks,even with botrk,its much safer to take Tristana or Ez and just stay out of their range while you shoot them,second shot could deal % max Hp damage,or his ult could be reworked to something that can actually do more than 300 damage to a tank,its a shittier MF ult,where you can move but your whole ult can be blocked by a tank or just dodged,at least MF can get lucky and ult 3-4 people and kill at least 2

Idk man, I think his kit is fine, I think its the fact that everything he synergizes with has been reworked in the last six months meanwhile he was also nerfed
press the attack lucian is p broken imo, i haven't done bad with it yet

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NlrmhEHV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-08T04:26:38.943+0000)
>
> What keystone did you use?

Electricute, which is bad, I shoulda used press the attack I know

I went 5/2/11 and did third damage in the game with most farm, it wasn't a bad game but i feel like with any other adc i'd be stronger
Then you did something horribly wrong. Take press the attack and be a cool broken champ.

He did something horribly wrong? Lucian is literally the LOWEST winrate adc,check it for yourself,he's one of my favorite champs and one of my most played ones and even with all the time i've spent with him it still feels like garbage to play compared to Vayne,Twitch,Ez,Mf,Tristana,his range is too low and he does 0 damage to tanks,why would anyone that him over Vayne who can shred tanks,kite better than he can,actually has a usefull ult,can stealth,can self peel and stun etc etc.He needs a rework
Lucian is busted with press the attack the fuck are you saying lmao
Good. Let him stay garbage along with Vayne. Kallista and the other mobile ADC cancer. Now if we can just break Twitch's legs we'll be in a good spot bot lane.
